hints.content:
On a clock there are two hands. The $\redD{\text{hour hand}}$ is the shorter hand.  The $\blueE{\text{minute hand}}$ is the longer hand.

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 5. The long minute hand points to 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/45a764740b107b33cf6707c08fe70c7abdbda8c9)

So, $\redD{1}{:}{00} $ looks like this:

![A clock shows the short hour hand points to 1. The long minute hand points to 12. Outside the edge of the clock are the numbers 1 through 12 labeling the numbers on the clock.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a2c2a4e45af8c23bc1ac4b751e8d39dfa66fa1a6)

$\redD{1}{:}{\blueE{45}}$ is $\blueE{45}$ ticks from $\redD{1}{:}{00}.$

![A clock shows the short hour hand is halfway between 1 and 2. The long minute hand points to 9. Outside the edge of the clock are the numbers 0 through 55 labeling every 5 minutes for the numbers on the clock.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/70fd1924772a2cce5b470b3fb0ef09f9ae410bf4)

Notice the hour hand is past $1{:}00$ but not quite to $2{:}00$.

This clock shows $1{:}{45}$.

![A clock shows the short hour hand is halfway between 1 and 2. The long minute hand points to 9.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/bb9d0e58839dff01ea6a0815b3ff4bbf98cb733b)

choices.content: ![A clock shows the short hour hand is halfway between 1 and 2. The long minute hand points to 9.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/bb9d0e58839dff01ea6a0815b3ff4bbf98cb733b)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is halfway between 12 and 1. The long minute hand points to 9.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/0b099b2b277f9eb65602605f14965a10001fb640)
![A clock shows the short hour hand is halfway between 1 and 2. The long minute hand points to 8.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/03ad7cc3ca692a5415adc491f302229d64ba4842)
